scripts.start: sh -c 'if [ -f dist/server.js ]; then node dist/server.js; else node server.js; fi'
scripts.dev: sh -c 'if [ -f server.ts ]; then node --trace-warnings --import tsx server.ts; else node --trace-warnings server.js; fi'
scripts.test: sh -c 'set -e; files=$(find . -not -path "./node_modules/*" \( -name "*.test.js" -o -name "*.test.ts" \) -print); if [ -z "$files" ]; then echo "No server tests found"; exit 0; fi; node --import tsx --test $files'
